name: Froge: Defend the rainforest
description:
Controls: arrow keys = move space = shoot

                               

A prototype of a game i am working on to help get visibility on a very important project. FROGE: DEFEND THE RAINFOREST  is an asteroids clone in extremely early development. You will play as $FROGE and defend the rain forest from people who would rather tear it down for resources than keep one of natures wonders.
